document_data.caption: A view over Merchant Square to the Cloak Tower as of 1479 DR.
document_data.name: Merchant Square
document_data.mainbody: The '''Merchant Square''' of [[Neverwinter]] was the financial hub of that city prior to the [[eruption of Mount Hotenow]].
document_data.Geography: The Merchant Square was located in Neverwinter's [[Tower District]].
document_data.History:
In the years prior to the eruption of [[Mount Hotenow]] in the {{YearlinkName|1451}}, the Merchant Square was a marketplace where merchants from all across the [[Sword Coast]] came to do business. The amount of [[money]] exchanged daily nearly rivaled the markets of [[Waterdeep]].

After the volcanic eruption, the area was abandoned and came to be infested with [[elemental weevil]]s. The vast wealth of the merchants was swiftly pillaged by [[bandit]]s.

As of {{Yearlink|1479}}, the Merchant Square had come to be occupied by [[orc]]s from [[Many-Arrows]], who clashed for control of the Tower District with the [[Neverwinter Guard]]. At the same time, a cell of [[Nasher]] rebels took up residence in the sewers, led by the [[half-orc]] [[Karr Nevrim]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The [[Merchant Guild Hall]], a once-extravagant building where merchant leaders would meet in the years prior to the cataclysm.
* The Merchant Square sewers,  which were badly damaged and partly collapsed after the eruption, but served as a hideout for bandits and rebels into the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
